summary: This is an internal email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, transmitting a draft letter regarding the identities of co-conspirators in the Ghislaine Maxwell case. The email is dated September 29, 2021, and includes an attachment of a discovery letter.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email, who is working on the Ghislaine Maxwell case and is drafting a letter regarding co-conspirator identities.

events.title: Drafting of Co-Conspirator Identity Letter
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney emails a draft letter regarding the identities of co-conspirators in the Ghislaine Maxwell case to their team.

keyFacts: The document is an internal email from a federal prosecutor dated September 29, 2021.
The email concerns a draft letter about identifying co-conspirators in the Ghislaine Maxwell case.
The attachment is a discovery letter titled '2021-09-XX_Maxwell_Discovery_Letter (CC_identities).docx'.
The correspondence indicates ongoing legal proceedings and discovery in the Maxwell case as of late 2021.
